short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays eBay watched items in a popup widget

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Mini version of the eBay site.

Tracks your eBay activity in a popup window.

Opens with a single click, quicker than a tab.

Tracks 

-ebay watched items
-items you're selling 
-items you've sold 
-my ebay
